item.title: My Git Command Collection
item.description: My Git Command Collection Like many other people, I tend to be frustrated often trying to find the right command while using Git. This document is an attempt to collect as many useful commands from various places on the internet to make commands easier to find in a single location. Before You Begin It is always a good idea to take a backup of your entire working directory including .git before you attempt anything mentioned here.

item.title: A Comprehensive Guide to Sorting in Pandas
item.description: A Comprehensive Guide to Sorting in Pandas In order to sort rows in Pandas, you can use the sort_values() function. I have taken examples from this excellant blog. Although it shows a lot of the use cases covered here, the last case is absent pretty much everywhere. In this tutorial, I will be showing how to use Pandas to sort rows based on different criterion. You can run a colab notebook containing all code present in this post by clicking here.
